value.name: Police: Man pulls gun during dispute over porch in Bladen County; leads officers on chase
value.description: Police in White Lake say a dispute over a porch escalated to a man pulling a gun on an officer and then leading authorities on a chase through Bladen and Sampson counties Monday afternoon.

value.name: Von on mission, not backing down in race vs. Father Time
value.description: Von Miller must be fading like your favorite T-shirt or blue jeans. He entered the league when Tim Tebow was still a quarterback and LMFAO was rockin' parties with its anthem. But a closer examination of the rings of his tree trunk reveal something differently.
